description:
Privacy focused wallpaper app built with MD3 Wall You is a Wallpaper App built with Material Design 3 (You). For that matter, the app supports a wide range of wallpaper sources. Most of them are unfortunately nonfree however, thus the anti-feature.
Features: * Wallpaper Browsing and Downloading * Automatic Wallpaper Changer * Favorites List * Wallpaper History * Image Filter Effects
